article.description: Darius Glover led six Florida A&M players in double figures with 26 points Wednesday night as the Rattlers kept Savannah State winless with a 92-68 victory.
article.headline: Clock ticking on winless season
article.story:
TALLAHASSEE, Fla. (AP) -- Darius Glover led six Florida A&M players in double figures with 26 points Wednesday night as the Rattlers kept Savannah State winless with a 92-68 victory.
Division I winless seasons
1991-92 Prairie View 0-28
1917-18 Dartmouth 0-26
2004-05 Savannah State 0-25
1936-37 William&Mary 0-18
1954-55 The Citadel 0-17
1944-45 Baylor 0-17
1923-24 Northwestern 0-16
1931-32 VMI 0-14
1943-44 VMI 0-14
1926-27 Saint Louis 0-14
1936-37 Middle Tenn. 0-11
1916-17 Oregon 0-11
1933-34 American 0-10
1942-43 Tulsa 0-10
1909-10 Drake 0-10
-- ESPN Research. Includes teams prior to D-I formation
Jonathan Kelly and James Pattman scored 12 each for the Rattlers (7-11) while Jon Mason and Tony Tate each had 11. Michael Harper added 10 points for Florida A&M. The Rattlers used a 9-2 run over the final 2:43 of the first half for a 44-37 halftime lead. Savannah State (0-25) got within five early in the second half and remained close for a while, but Florida A&M outscored the Tigers 34-17 over the final 13 minutes. Sherard Reddick had 18 and Donald Larson added 16 points for Savannah State, a Division I independent. Its 28-game season ends Feb. 14. Savannah State took its first lead on two Donald Larson free throws with 11:17 left in the first half. The teams exchanged the lead eight times and the scored was tied nine times before the Rattlers run broke a 35-all tie.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
